amendment.description: An amendment numbered 31 printed in House Report 119-232 to reduce funding for the Great Lakes Authority and transfer to the SRA.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 120 - 302 (Roll no. 235).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 120 - 302 (Roll no. 235).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
